title: Boosting charge transport in the BiVO4 photoanode interface modified with an aluminum hydroxide layer for solar water oxidation
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3SE01656K, Paper
Waka Matsumoto, Takashi Fukushima, Satoshi Heguri, Syuji Fujii, Shinya Higashimoto
Modifying BiVO4 with Al(OH)3 layers improved its PEC properties due to an increase of surface wettability. The strong interfacial interaction with H2O played a vital role in efficient charge carrier transportation on the BiVO4 interface.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
